H0.text: Seasonal changes are a result of the tilt of Earth's axis.

H1.text: Hours in a day are a result of the tilt of Earth's axis.

H2.text: Heights of tides are a result of the tilt of Earth's axis.

H3.text: Moon phases are a result of the tilt of Earth's axis.

A4.text: This is the cause of Earth's seasons.

A5.text: This means that one pole (and the associated hemisphere of Earth) will be directed away from the Sun at one side of the orbit, and half an orbit later (half a year later) this pole will be directed towards the Sun.
